title: KPOP Promise: 1-3
description: Complete CollectionRemember Tonight (Book 1)This Love With U (Book 2)But I Love You Today (Book 3)It was supposed to be a one night stand, but fate had another plan. When Lyric hopped on a plane to attend her favorite KPOP band’s concert in Las Vegas, the last thing she expected was to have a one-night stand with the hot Korean rapper, Jae-Mi.KPOP superstar, Jae-Mi, has worked hard to get where he is. He has given his blood, sweat, and tears to the entertainment industry. Now that he has reached a level of success beyond his wildest dreams - he won’t let anything or anyone stand in his way....but what about love.
author: Love Journey
